channel.title: Ultimate Defend Your Castle
channel.description:
I was bored so i wrote this. Basically it plays the entire game of "Defend Your Castle"..
Makes archers, wizards, workers. Buys walls. Saves money & avoids Unit upkeep. ect.
If you have a slow computer or the game gets slow for you after about level 20+ then it will struggle and won't be able to click the dudes properly due to lag.
It also saves screenshots, but that is optional. My computer's crap and, of course, it lagged and i was Defeated by level 23.
I tried putting it on Low Quality but the increase in a colour screws ip, although it worked a lot faster.
[img]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/4013/23startstagenb8.jpg[/img]
It saves Converts as the more you have, the more Unit Upkeep there is. More Unit Upkeep, Not enough money you lose your archers/wizards/workers. Not worth it.
Post Errors.
Game Link: http://emuse.ebaumsworld.com/games/play/820

item.title: Ultimate Defend Your Castle
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

very leet script, it started to get sloppy, im just gonna give an example of 2 glitches i found. the soldiers coming at u can only hit the front, for arguements sake lets say 6 solders= front of the castle. soldiers 1-2-3-4-5 are killed but the script leaves behind number 6.

also when the big guys came, the script didnt get him, it didnt even get the small guys it was too busy trying to get the big guy. btw around wave 12 the big guy came

Read full topic

item.title: Ultimate Defend Your Castle
item.dc:creator: @SturmxHawke SturmxHawke
item.description:
@SturmxHawke wrote:

I found an awesome SCAR script for this game that does do the fighting part, but doesn’t build and buy and such, is there any way to combine 2 scripts? I’ll try to implement the build+buy sequence in the good SCAR script I have of this game, this one couldn’t go further because it shut down after lvl 1 because of something with not being able to create a file in a folder, because that folder didn’t exist. I’m a SCAR-noobie so I probably won’t be able to if anyone wants to know the script just tell me

EDIT:

nvm, forgot to read the previous posts XD my bad

Read full topic
